name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: C³ Cloud Control Centre from www.adepteo.net

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud Control Centre for all your cloud services. Finds telephone numbers on the page and provides a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adepteo Cloud Control Centre C³.  This provides a close interface between your browser and the Hydra CRM system.

Features enabled permit you to easily add new phone numbers and email addresses to your CRM entries.

Dial numbers, activate livechat sessions, send and receive SMS messages and many more activities.

Complete control of all of your Adepteo provided Cloud services
